Definition: The input is a tweet. The tweet can be classified as Hate Speech, Offensive, or Normal. If the tweet contains threatening language towards the community targeted, the tweet belongs to the Hate Speech class. If the tweet contains abusive or discriminatory language towards the community targeted, the tweet belongs to the Offensive class. If the tweet does not contain any threatening or abusive language, the tweet belongs to the Normal class.
